text: The group stage of the 2006 CAF Confederation Cup was played from 12 August to 28 October 2006. A total of eight teams competed in the group stage. ==Format== In the group stage, each group was played on a home-and-away round- robin basis. The winners of each group advanced directly to the final. {|class="wikitable" !Key to colours in group tables |- bgcolor=#ccffcc |Group winners advance to the final |} ==Groups== ===Group A=== {|class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" !width="165"|Team !width="20"|Pts !width="20"|Pld !width="20"|W !width="20"|D !width="20"|L !width="20"|GF !width="20"|GA !width="20"|GD |- align=center bgcolor=ccffcc |style="text-align:left;"| FAR Rabat |13||6||4||1||1||9||5||4||Final |- align=center |style="text- align:left;"| Olympique Khouribga |10||6||3||1||2||6||4||2 |- align=center |style="text-align:left;"| Petro Atlético |8||6||2||2||2||10||7||3 |- align=center |style="text-align:left;"| GD Interclube |3||6||1||0||5||3||12||-9 |} {|class="wikitable" !width="200"|Home !width="60"|Score !width="200"|Away |- | style="text-align:right;"|GD Interclube | style="text-align:center;"|1 -
